body:
As always, thanks for the response Greg.

As suggested I tried adding the -bn option, however ;rtcontrib' still
only generates 248 unfinished files with the '-e MF:2' option.  All
works fine with 'e MF:1'.  I tried sending the files to a ramdisk, but
still no joy.

I'm wondering if I did something funny when compiling the most recent
head under OS X?  Has anyone had similar results using Linux or Cygwin?

Thanks,
Chris H

On Feb 5, 2010, at 11:00 PM, Greg Ward wrote:
subject: [Radiance-general] Understanding rtcontrib
